verbose_text: Thus, we hypothesized that celecoxib inhibited the PI3K / Akt pathway by reducing the level of phosphorylation of Akt, which in turn activated the expression and activation of caspase-8 and -9, resulting in apoptosis through the death receptor and mitochondrial pathways in SGC-7901 cells.
evidence: celecoxib inhibited the PI3K/Akt pathway by reducing the level of phosphorylation of Akt
